author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this zero-dependency package will download and install grpc v1.0.1 prebuilt-binaries from https://github.com/kaizhu256/node-grpc-lite
name: grpc-lite

scripts.test: rm -fr external /tmp/grpc_node-* && npm run postinstall && export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test test.js
